projects.name: HomeLab Server
projects.description: Actually this is kinda just a private project that i conducted for fun only. this server was based on debian and it was running openmediavault. it also serve as AirPlay server, SpotifyServer, and a ZerotierNode

projects.name: Windows 11 on NABU
projects.description: Nabu was actually a codename for Xiaomi Pad 5, and i was able to install windows 11 on it. it was a fun project to do, and i was able to use it as a daily driver. i dualbooted the windows with some custom android named 'EvolutionX' and it was a pretty smooth os
